name: Titaneers
description:
NOTE: This game is still work in progress. The final build will be published on 1.6.2022.
Aalto Game Project course 2022 spring project.

Our team:
  • Reetu Kontio - Game design, programming
  • Zezhong Wang - Game design, programming, project management
  • Peiyu Ling - Level design, programming
  • Aliinsti Noguest - Programming, UI
  • Sunqi Zhu - 3D modeling, animation
  • Partik Boman - 3D modeling, environmental assets
  • Mikko Saarinen - Sound design, music
  • Chengwei Qi - Visual effects

Controls:

MovementWASDJump/Grapple pullSpaceAttackMouse 1Shoot grappleMouse 2BoostLeft ShiftTime slowFRespawnR
